jobs.title: Front-End Engineer (React & Redux)
jobs.description: Join our Bangalore team as a Front-End Engineer. You will work with React and Redux to build responsive, scalable web applications that meet the needs of our clients.

jobs.title: React.js Developer
jobs.description: We are hiring a React.js Developer for our Kolkata team. Your role will involve building high-performance applications using React.js and modern JavaScript frameworks.

jobs.title: Full Stack React Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a Full Stack React Developer to work on both front-end and back-end web development. You will use React, Node.js, and MongoDB to build innovative web solutions.

company.name: EvolvTech Solutions
company.description: EvolvTech Solutions is a leading technology company specializing in web-based solutions for industries such as finance, healthcare, and e-commerce.

jobs.title: XReact Native Developer
jobs.description: Join Mobile Masters BD as a React Native Developer. You will develop mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using React Native and contribute to the mobile development lifecycle.
